bcl:section.bcl:text: In this regulation, Act means the Financial Institutions Act.

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Monetary penalties for prescribed provisions of the Act and regulations

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: The provisions of the Act and regulations in Column 2 of the schedule are prescribed for the purposes of section 253.1 (1) (a) and (b) of the Act, as applicable.

A person who contravenes a provision in Column 2 of the schedule is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding the monetary penalty in Column 3 of the schedule for that contravention, as applicable.

oasis:line.in:strong:
Column 2
Prescribed provision of Act or regulation

oasis:entry.oasis:line: Section 4 of the Audit and Audit Committee Regulation, B.C. Reg. 314/90
Section 10 (2) of the Capital Requirements Regulation, B.C. Reg. 315/90
Section 3 (1) of the Insurance Company Reinsurance Limitation Regulation, B.C. Reg. 324/90
Section 3 (2) of the Insurance Company Reinsurance Limitation Regulation, B.C. Reg. 324/90
Section 3 (3) of the Insurance Company Reinsurance Limitation Regulation, B.C. Reg. 324/90
Section 2 (1) of the Insurer Complaints Regulation, B.C. Reg. 206/2011
Section 7 of the Investment and Lending Regulation, B.C. Reg. 330/90
Section 3 (1) of the Financial Products Disclosure Regulation, B.C. Reg. 573/2004
Section 3 (2) of the Financial Products Disclosure Regulation, B.C. Reg. 573/2004
Section 3.1 (5) of the Financial Products Disclosure Regulation, B.C. Reg. 573/2004
Section 4 of the Financial Products Disclosure Regulation, B.C. Reg. 573/2004
Section 7 of the Related Party Transactions Regulation, B.C. Reg. 334/90

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions relevant to the enactment of this regulation: Financial Institutions Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 141, s. 289.]
